TopicTitle: I want clouds on my Kerbin

Articles.Content:
Okay so I have seen playthroughs all over YouTube of people who use Environmental Visual enhancements.

 

I would like to install that mod and i understand mods like that have supplemental mods. So, what is the full list of mods i need to make EVE work to its best?

 

Additionally where do i put all of the different file types? I know most mod ReadMes say to just drop the mod's gamedata folder into that of the KSP directory, but I have discovered that with a lot of big mods, certain fioe types need to be placed elsewhere. .dll, .cfg and .cs are the biggest confusions for me.

 

Thanks.

The mods required to make EVE work to its best are as follows:

1. EVE

2. EVE

3. did I mention EVE?

There are a few more, but I think you get the point.

.dll files should be placed in Gamedata, as well as most folders that contain material in them. This is pretty much it, except with very few exceptions that the modders would usually inform you of.
There are instructions on the EVE thread OP on how to install the mod. It's pretty straight forward.
